index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE creating a Department of Licenses and Consumer Affairs; providing for the appointment of a Director and defining his duties; establishing, transferring and abolishing certain positions in connection therewith, establishing budget allowances by reappropriation and transfer; transferring records, facilities and equipment to said department; and repealing Ordinances 70328, 99581, and all other ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
